name: Knight Adventure
description: Help the Valiant Knight to save a beautiful Princess.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP (SP2 or newer) / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium/AMD, 1,6 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® / ATI™ Radeon™ with 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse

reviews.review_text: What to expect when the game itself looks like hobos armpit on the screenshots, and the game trailer! lags like it was frapsed with 5 fps? Yeh, the only reason for this game to be at steam - steam cards and 90% sale.
